data.name: ben
data.value: Leo, are you seeing what I'm seeing?

data.name: leo
data.value: Yeah, is that going to show up on the camera? Janet, can you see cool stuff here?

data.name: leo
data.value: I love that Louis Armstrong song.

data.name: ben
data.value: Across the river there's a little, uh, what do you call it, inlet, but people put a silly monster face on it. Okay, can you see that? Way over there?

data.name: ben
data.value: Well… we tried. It’s probably the coolest thing you could possibly imagine.
